name: Sengoku Basara 4: Sumeragi - Anniversary Edition
summary: This edition includes the following PS4 Game: Sengoku Basara 4: Sumeragi (Sengoku Basara 4 Sumeragi + 56 pieces of downloadable content on disc), Special Illustrated Box, Download Code for Weapon Item, Special booklet "Sengoku Heroes 15th Anniversary Art Book"
